Package presenters.gui

Class MainMenuGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • presenters.gui.GUI
      • presenters.gui.MainMenuGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MainMenuIO, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class MainMenuGUI
extends GUI
implements MainMenuIO, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class implements the MainMenuIO interface using Swing to create a GUI to display stats to the user.

        Specified by:
